title: Express.js Basics: Routing and Middleware
description: Learn Express framework fundamentals including app setup, routing (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), and middleware concepts.

title: Middleware: Request Processing Pipeline
description: Master middleware creation, built-in middleware, third-party middleware, and middleware ordering.

title: Advanced Routing: Routes, Routers, and Patterns
description: Learn route parameters, query strings, route groups with express.Router(), and routing patterns.

title: Request and Response Objects
description: Understand req and res objects, headers, cookies, body parsing, and sending different response types.

title: Error Handling and Status Codes
description: Learn error-handling middleware, HTTP status codes, try/catch in routes, and proper error responses.

title: Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement user authentication with JWT, sessions, Passport.js, and role-based access control.

title: Database Integration: MongoDB, PostgreSQL
description: Connect Express with databases, create models, perform CRUD operations with ORMs like Mongoose or Sequelize.

title: File Upload and Storage
description: Handle file uploads with multer, validate file types and sizes, store files locally or in cloud storage.

title: RESTful API Design and Validation
description: Design RESTful APIs, validate input data, implement pagination and filtering, API documentation.

title: Deployment and Production Best Practices
description: Prepare Express apps for production, environment configuration, logging, monitoring, and deployment options.
